parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets foreground color of given control. Color is in format [[Color|Color (RGBA)]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> control '''ctrlSetForegroundColor''' color

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> color: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <ext><name>pre</name><attr/><inner>_control ctrlSetForegroundColor [1, 0, 0, 1]</inner><close></pre></close></ext>
</value></part></template>
